GSD.description:
iommu: Fix potential use-after-free during probe

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.10 by commit f74fc4b5bd533ea3d30ce47cccb8ef8d21fda85a. For more details please see the references link.
